cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.CE, cs.IT. 

This paper deals with machine learning algorithms for contextual bandits with risk constraints, which is a problem commonly studied in the field of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also involves optimization techniques such as online mirror descent, which falls under the category of algorithms and data structures (cs.DS). The concept of risk is also a common topic in control engineering (cs.CE) and information theory (cs.IT), which could be relevant to this paper.
